name: Introduction to Programming
desc: Learn the fundamentals of programming using Python, including variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
desc: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build responsive and interactive websites.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
desc: Learn common data structures, algorithms, and problem-solving techniques for efficient coding.

name: Object-Oriented Programming
desc: Learn object-oriented programming concepts using Java including classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

name: Database Systems
desc: Introduction to relational databases, SQL queries, and database design principles.

name: Mobile App Development
desc: Learn to develop mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native and Flutter.

name: Software Engineering
desc: Learn software development methodologies, version control, testing, and project management.

name: DevOps and Cloud Computing
desc: Learn DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms like AWS and Docker.

name: Frontend Frameworks
desc: Master modern frontend frameworks including React, Vue.js, and Angular.

name: Backend Development
desc: Build robust backend systems using Node.js, Express, and RESTful APIs.
